The idea is funny and very good. However this game needs ABSOLUTELY more complex rules : there are a lot of possibility using the different food cards and the different race track cards (which could be playtested by the authors and included in the rules!).

(KIDS) Two play with my 4 and 6 year old daughters (also played this once with both daughters and wife). They thought it was okay, but I was disappointed. When I read about this game, it sounded clever and interesting. After two plays, I found it dull and boring because the scoring feels largely out of our control.

Cute rubber pigs that can jump other pigs when playing a card of their color and grab food cards when they obtain the lead. Might be fun when playing with young kids. now using pig tokens as wild boars for 2022 mini expansion in Sanssouci

Top filler! Fast and fun

For trade. Very good condition.

Boardgame edition from Ravensburger with the title Pig Trotters. Beautiful game parts and scores highly on cuteness. The game board has beautiful graphics and lots of charm. Great for adults for an opening game or filler game. SdJ children's game award winner 1992. The board is actually much more charming than the card game edition of this game.

Suitable for 2 players. 30 mins absolute max. Very light game. Trade as we have another version of this game.
Simple, easy, funny for Grandparents, Kids and me (with friends as a Drinking-Game. Last in row always has to do so) : )
